resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3113</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 13 :Argument For and Against</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - keine 13:Argument für und gegen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de lecture - aucuns 13 :Argument pour et 
contre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões da leitura - nenhuns 13:Argument para e 
de encontro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi della lettura - nessun 13:Argument per e 
contro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 13 :Argument για και 
ενάντια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas de la lectura - ningunos 13:Argument 
para y contra</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a writing assignment where the students read a passage about the fur trade and are asked to list arguments for and against , and to infer the writers opinion about the topic.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">argument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">debates.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für dieses ist eine Schreiben Anweisung, der die
Kursteilnehmer einen Durchgang über den Pelzhandel lesen und werden 
gebeten, Argumente und gegen auszudrucken, und die Verfassermeinung 
über das Thema zu schließen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une affectation d'écriture pour où les 
étudiants lisent un passage au sujet du commerce de fourrure et sont 
invités à énumérer des arguments et contre, et pour impliquer 
l'opinion d'auteurs au sujet du sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição da escrita onde os 
estudantes leiam uma passagem sobre o comércio da pele e sejam 
pedidos para alistar argumentos para e de encontro, e para infer a 
opinião dos escritores sobre o tópico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione di scrittura dove gli 
allievi leggono un passaggio circa il commercio della pelliccia e sono
chiesti di elencare gli argomenti per e contro ed arguire l'opinione 
dei produttori circa il soggetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ανάθεση γραψίματος όπου οι σπουδαστές
διαβάζουν μια μετάβαση για το εμπόριο γουνών και καλούνται να 
εμφανίσουν λίστα τα ορίσματα για και ενάντια, και για να 
συμπεράνει την άποψη συγγραφέων για το θέμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una asignación de la escritura para 
donde los estudiantes leen un paso sobre el comercio de la piel y se 
piden enumerar los argumentos y contra, y deducir la opinión de los 
programas de escritura sobre el asunto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Debatten.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">argument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">discussions.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">argumento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">debates.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">argomento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dibattiti.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όρισμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συζητήσεις.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">argumento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">discusiones.</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
